title: Skin unlocked but can not use
body: I used 3 skin shards to unlock a permanent skin and I unlocked championship riven. If i go to my collection of champs and click on riven it says the skin is unlocked and owned, however when I get into a lobby and go to pick a skin it says I do not own it?

replies.body:
There are two versions of Championship Riven, you're most likely looking at the wrong one. The skin you unlocked is the 2016 version!

https://i.gyazo.com/095a4ba0a790cb2b3b3afa499530bb78.jpg

https://i.gyazo.com/ec70a8cfc44d4caacafa14e7e6777714.jpg
Make sure you look through all the skins when you are in the lobby, there are 2 versions of the Championship Riven skin and they are separated.
